Anybody up for some impromptu Nokia N800 hacking at the Vancouver Super Happy Dev House on Friday? I am in as long as:
i) it's less than a 1000 lines of code; I am an old man and can't keep more than 1000 lines in my head at once :-)
ii) we use a dynamic language like PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby, etc. Sorry I am done with C++, Java, C# etc and refuse to program in them ever again!
